fields.headline: Kevin Hart, Perth
fields.bodyText: Kevin Hart began his career sizing men and women for footwear, but after trying his luck at an amateur comedy night in Philadelphia, he gave up the shoes for a career in stand up. Now he’s one of America’s hottest comedians and actors, and this month, he’ll make his Australian debut with his live show, What Now. After appearing at Montreal’s Just For Laughs comedy festival, he starred in Scary Movie 3 and Along Came Polly. More recently, his film titles include About Last Night, Little Fockers, and The 40 Year Old Virgin. He’s won several teen choice awards and is the second American in history to sell out London’s O2 arena. Type of Event: Comedy Venue: Perth Arena 700 Wellington St Perth WA 6000 Date: 3 February 2016 Price: from $105 Website: Ticketek Telephone: (08) 6365 0700 Sign up to our weekly culture newsletter:
